items.summary: Update the app’s primary site URL configuration to use exactly "https://prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz/" (no "www") and ensure the application does not display or reference the draft URL "https://significant-blush-1gq-draft.caffeine.xyz/" or the "https://www.prasadenterprise.caffeine.xyz" variant anywhere in user-facing UI copy, links intended to represent the site’s primary URL, or metadata derived from SITE_CONFIG.
